text: geudaega geudeul-eul bol ttae geudeul-ui oehyeong-i geudaeleul nollage hal geos-imyeo geudeul-i malhal ttaemyeon geudaeneun geudeul-ui hwasul-e gileul giul-il geos-ila geuleo na geudeul-eun byeog-e gidaeeojin jaemoggwa gat-a geudeul-ui modeun oechim-i geudeul-e ge geoyeoghago issdago saeng-gaghanola geudeul-eun jeog-ila geuleomeulo geudeul-eul juuihala hananim-ui jeojuga geudeul-ege iss-eul geos-ila geudeul-eun eolmana jinlieseo beos-eona yuhogdoeeo issneunyo
